name: ai-chat-md-export
description: CLI tool to convert ChatGPT and Claude chat history to Markdown

scripts.test:e2e: bun run build && bun test tests/e2e
scripts.ci: bun run typecheck && bun run lint:check && bun run test && bun run build && bun run test:e2e && bun run knip
scripts.conv:chatgpt: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/chatgpt/conversations.json -o data/md/chatgpt -f chatgpt
scripts.conv:claude: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/claude/conversations.json -o data/md/claude -f claude
scripts.conv:all: bun run conv:chatgpt && bun run conv:claude
scripts.conv:chatgpt:watch: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/chatgpt/conversations.json -o data/md/chatgpt -f chatgpt 2>&1 | tee chatgpt-warnings.log
scripts.conv:claude:watch: bun run src/cli.ts -i data/raw/claude/conversations.json -o data/md/claude -f claude 2>&1 | tee claude-warnings.log
scripts.demo:date-filter: bun run src/cli.ts -i tests/fixtures/chatgpt/multi-date.json --dry-run && bun run src/cli.ts -i tests/fixtures/chatgpt/multi-date.json --since 2024-01-01 --dry-run
scripts.demo:all: bun run demo:quiet && bun run demo:dry-run && bun run demo:search && bun run demo:search-no-match && bun run demo:combined && bun run demo:date-filter
